title: Up To One Month FREE On Two-Bedroom Floor Plans
posting_body: ['For leasing info call or text', 'show contact info', 'today!', 'Ask about ID#249612', 'Luxury Apartments in Stafford, TX', 'Home is much more than just somewhere to rest your head.', 'You should find a place that matches your personality, providing you with the vibrant community you need to truly come to life.', 'Welcome to this community, an iconic property in Stafford that celebrates innovation and eclectic living.', 'Whether you are new to the area or you’ve been searching for years to locate a community where lives and relationships spring from invention, welcome to your perfect home.', 'With a variety of studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments to choose from, this community provides top-notch luxury for the ultimate living experience.', 'Each apartment illuminates high-end features and once you’ve settled into your new home, you can take advantage of our amazing community amenities.', 'Shopping and restaurants are within easy walking distance, as are a variety of opportunities for recreation.', 'Community Amenities', 'Online portal for rent payments + service requests', '24/7 Luxer package lockers', 'The Core: Wellness center with Technogym equipment', 'Pet park', 'Resident lounge', 'Outdoor lounge with TV and fire pit', 'Resort style pool with grills', 'Resident courtyard with firepit, grills, hammocks']
